0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000.name: REF Vault — vbUSDC
0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000.description: Collateral-only vault for vbUSDC (Reference Asset). Oracle prices based on Cork pool exercise value: min(NAV, swapRate × sUSDe/USD × (1 - fee) × hPool).

0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000.name: cST Vault — vbUSDC4cST
0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000.description: Collateral-only vault for cST (Cork Swap Token). Oracle value = 0. Required paired with vbUSDC for the Cork exercise path during liquidation.

0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000.name: Borrow Vault — sUSDe
0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000.description: Borrowable sUSDe. Deposit vbUSDC + cST as matched collateral to borrow and achieve leveraged yield exposure.
